name: Bullet In Time
description:
Part of the 72 hour game jam for ScoreSpace 10. The theme for the game jam was direction. You cannot shoot and you only parry nearby bullets or hit enemies close to you.

Loads of bloom and particles in the windows .exe. Its the better looking version of the game. :)
Particles without bloom in the android .apk.

1. Only controls are the mouse.
2. You can move by dragging with the mouse.
3. You can parry bullets that are close to you.
4. Parried bullets will damage and stun enemies.
5. When stunned, drag in the direction shown to hit enemies.
6. Complete a sequence of 5 melee hits to gain back health and time.
